title: One of Alan Wake 2's expansions sounds like it's going to take us back to Control
description: Remedy has two paid expansions coming to Alan Wake 2, and one of them has a very familiar ring.

description: The bundle includes more than 250 games, and is already well past its initial $15,000 goal.

title: Counter-Strike 2 doesn't have Arms Race and others yet, but Valve says relax: 'those modes haven't been forgotten!'

title: On National Black Cat Day, a game about a black cat who is also a grizzled 1950s detective is free on GOG

title: For such a gorgeous game Alan Wake 2 runs surprisingly well on budget graphics cards

title: Disney Dreamlight Valley ditches free-to-play plan at the last minute, will launch in December as a premium game

title: You can run Alan Wake 2 on a 10-series or older graphics card, but you definitely shouldn't
description: I've stuck a GTX 1080 in our test bench and I just cannot get anywhere close to passable performance.

description: War has changed.

title: Alan Wake 2 is a stunning example of what the future of PC gaming looks like—but only on Nvidia
